charges.charge_disposition: REVOCATION SENTENCE: stipulates guilt to violation of condition(s) Standard of the term of supervision. IMPRISONMENT: The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a total term of 8 months. The defendant is remanded to the custody of the United States Marshal. SUPERVISED RELEASE REVOCATION SENTENCE: Supervised release revocation hearing held on October 8, 2008. The defendant stipulated to the violation of Conditions of Release. IMPRISONMENT - The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons for a total term of 12 months and 1 day. The defendant is remanded to the custody of the United States Marshal. SUPERVISED RELEASE Upon release from imprisonment, the defendant shall be on supervised release for a term of 18 months. Standard and special conditions of supervision are requested. ORIGINAL SENTENCE: The defendant pleaded guilty to Count 1 on 12/18/06 of the Indictment. IMPRISONMENT: The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a total term of 12 months and 1 day. The defendant is remanded to the custody of the United States Marshal. SUPERVISED RELEASE: Upon release from imprisonment, the defendant shall be on supervised release for a term 2 years. Standard and special conditions of supervision requested. CRIMINAL MONETARY PENALTIES: $100.00 MSA. No fine. No restitution.
